Package pl.edu.pwr.student.IO.Input

Class SignalSender

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.pwr.student.IO.Input.SignalSender
All Implemented Interfaces:
CreatableInstance
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicGate, BasicPassThrough, Button, Clock, DebugButton, Switch
public abstract class SignalSender extends Object implements CreatableInstance
Class representing a signal sender in a circuit.

    • connection

      public void connection(SignalReceiver receiver)
      Attempts to connect the given SignalReceiver to this signal sender if they aren't connect. Attempts to disconnect the given SignalReceiver from this signal sender if they had already been connected.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the SignalReceiver to (dis)connect.

    • disconnectOutputs

      public void disconnectOutputs()
      Disconnects all output receivers from this signal sender.

    • fullDisconnect

      public void fullDisconnect()
      Disconnects all input and output receivers from this signal sender.

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected(SignalReceiver receiver)
      Checks if the given signal receiver is currently connected to this signal sender.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the signal receiver to check.
      Returns:
      true if the given signal receiver is currently connected to this signal sender, false otherwise.

    • sendUpdate

      protected void sendUpdate()
      Sends an update signal to all output receivers of this signal sender.
